transcript:
Customer: Hello, hello.
Executive: Ji sir jo maine bataya aapko samajh mein aaya?
Customer: Dekhiye jo cheez aap bata rahe hain wo to main manta hun. Dekhiye ratings aap bhi jante hain. Dekhiye do do bando ne aap bhi dekh pa rahe honge. Do ne rating jo di hai ek full di hai na. Jo teen jo main bata chuka hun ye do already jo wo ek buyer hai matlab buyer nahi wo seller hai wo. Wo matlab mal kharidne wale nahi hai wo dene wale hain yahan tak.
Customer: To matlab unse dekhiye unki rating ka agar aap mujhe ye bataiye as a paid hum paid as a vendor matlab ki supplier aap hum registered hue pade hain to ye facility aapko deni chahiye na that ki koi agar galat review dalta hai jo matlab ki actual review mante hain ki hai par ek galat review to aap bhi isko kar sakte hain na ki main hide isko.
Executive: Haan ye to sir dekho aapke competitor hai. Aisa log karte nahi hai lekin pata nahi aapke competitor aisa kyun hai aisa kar rahe hain.
Customer: To main unse puchta agar kya hai aisa kya hai?
Executive: Sir wo cheez mujhe bhi pata hai ye dekhiye wo mere father ne aapko bata chuke hain that ki wo us person baat karne mein razi nahi hai. Actually unse humne mal liya bhi hai ye nahi mal denge ki usse tab bhi usne pata nahi kya rating dal rakha hai.
Customer: To meri aap request ye hai agar aap is rating ko agar hide agar aap kar pao to aur bhi behtar rahega kyunki ye hamare rating se dekho sir ye hide hota nahi sir kisi bhi platform mein agar koi customer rating diya hai to hide nahi hota sir.
Customer: Fir aisa hide hota to koi bhi amazon flipkart sab matlab aur bhi rating achi agar hum karwate hain to tab ye behtar rahega na.
Executive: Haan iska matlab wahi hai na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Iska ek hi solution hai jo maine bataya na ki aap wahan pe ja kar ke customer ko link send kare jisse aapki achi baat chit ho rahi ho customer ko ek bar bol sakte hain ki sir mujhe ek achi rating de dijiyega.
Customer: Nahi nahi main us cheez ke nahi keh raha main aapko main yahi keh raha hun ki agar hamare aur achche customer matlab rating achi dete hain to ye apne aap hi aage main show nahi matlab ki show nahi ho payenge.
Executive: Haan ye niche chala ja ye niche jata jayega jo bhi nayi rating aayega na wo nayi rating upar client hoga na hamara.
Customer: Dekhiye aage jo client hoga usse hum request karenge sir ki ye rate mujhe achi dijiye par mujhe ek cheez bataiye suniye suniye ratings se chaliye main manta hun ki direct client nahi aayega ek ye percentage wala hota hai manta hun par mujhe ye bataiye aap lead kyun nahi aati lead kyun nahi aari aapke yahan.
Executive: Lead to aani chahiye na.
Customer: Dekhiye lead to ye to ye cheez main aapka account mujhe nahi hun to mujhe pata nahi aapka service kaise chal raha hai aapke account me se lead hai lekin main aapki dekh raha hun ki leads aa rahi hai ki nahi aa rahi hai waise aap leads consume to kar rahe hain daily basis pe.
Executive: Haan hai na to please aap is cheez ka dhyan rakhen ki lead aati rahe achi ya buri to baad mein hum dekhenge par at least lead aayengi to hum consume kar payenge na. Jo humko lead humko last month mein 38 leads consume kiya tha.
Customer: Haan october mein september mein aapne 42 kiya tha to itni lead aap consume kar rahe hain to matlab leads aa rahi hai tabhi to kar rahe hain sir.
Executive: Sir lead aana bhi dekhiye manta hun dekhiye aati hain to main aapko bata chuka hun ki ek mahine ke andar ek client bhi agar hamara client nahi nahi matlab ban pata hai to wo bekar hi hai na.
Executive: Conversion nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Haan conversion nahi ho raha hai. Mujhe ye bataiye suniye suniye matlab ye bataiye matlab ki bina sirf khali number ya fir ya email id ki aap kisi ko lead de sakte hain kya aise ke hum matlab jyada hum chahte hain GST ya jo inka GST registered person hai humko yahan par 50 se haan wo hai to behtar rahega ki usse show honi chahiye that ki verified hai nahi hai.
Executive: Ji ji sir.
Customer: Ji ji sir. Ye aur behtar rahega na. Aap na jaise aapke abhi thoda problem aa raha hai aap connect nahi kar pa rahe hain theek se aapki aawaz nahi aa rahi hai video call pe nahi to main aapko aur achche se ek bar bata deta agar system se aap suniye suniye aisa karte hain aap sham ke I think main aapko main aapko is number se main baat kar lunga to ye to jo number hai na ye mera number aapko show nahi kar raha hoga. Mera number aap note kar lo.
Customer: Aisa kare aap mujhe apna number mujhe bhej do aap mujhe time bata do main kar lunga. Aap mujhe 4 420 pe aap mujhe phone kar pa behtar rahega.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai theek hai is time pe ek bar hum achche se connect karte hain aur main aapko ek bar aur kya galti ho rahi hai. Saari cheez check kar lete hain ek bar theek hai sir. Achcha theek hai yahi number hai na aapka.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is concerned about negative ratings.

- Wants to hide negative ratings from profile.

- Concerned about low lead conversion rate.

- Wants leads with GST verified details.



Resolution:

- Executive said ratings cannot be hidden.

- Suggested sending link to customers for good ratings.

- Executive will check lead generation.

- Will connect again at 4:20 PM to discuss further.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 4:20 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- ratings, leads, conversion, gst, profile
